articles.description: Apple is gearing up to unveil iOS 18 at WWDC, featuring new AI features like auto-summarisation for notifications and enhancements to Siri. Here's what to expect from the upcoming update.
articles.content: Apple is gearing up to unveil its latest advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) at the Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) on June 10, according to reports from Bloomberg's Mark Gurman. The … [+2994 chars]

articles.title: Is sending astronauts to Mars possible? This NASA-funded rocket aims to do it in 2 months | Mint - Mint
articles.description: This technology could potentially allow astronauts and cargo to travel to and from Mars more efficiently and rapidly than current spacecraft, NASA said
articles.content: No astronaut has yet been to Mars, however, a new NASA-funded innovative rocket system is all set to make this travel possible in a span of 2 months. The challenge of landing humans on Mars includes … [+2413 chars]
